features: Material: vinyl,light weight and it can be folded & easy to carry;
High resolution and quality & not easy fade;It can swab with water,easy to keep clean;
It is an ideal property To record your unforgettable moments.
The backgrop is glare free and roll out flat; It is great for studio photography:
For the Photography of event,home,festival,Holiday and all kind of party.
description: Kind Reminder:Only need 15-20days when your place the order

Material: Vinyl & Computer Painted(Not Washable)  Color: As picture shown Features: Light Absorption, Non-reflective  Size: 3*5ft(1*1.5m) and Customized as your request Delivery: 3 to 5 days  Usage:For the Photography of Wedding,Adults,Children,Holiday & All Kind of Party

Vinyl Cloth Backdrops Is Our Latest And Greatest Computer Painted Wrinkle-Free Fleece-Like Fabric. This Lightweight Fabric Will Give You The Intense Vivid Color That You Have Been Looking For A Backdrop. It Is An Ideal Property To Record Your Unforgettable Moments.  We Also Supply The Background With Same Picture In Other Size,3x5ft,4x5ft,4x6.5ft,5x6.5ft,6.5x10ft,8x15ft,5x7ft

According to rule of post office, length of item cannot be more than 1.2m. Items will be sent folded.So there may be creases. Here are ways to solve it:1) Roll it up tightly with a cylinder for 3-4 days, it will be ok.2) Heat it with a steam iron on the back of item, then it will be smooth again.3) Stretch it and clamp it to a back drop stand for 3-4 days, it also works.  Please understand that every computer screen is different, therefore,colors may vary slightly.
